event.description: Ian Kinsler flies out to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Elvis Andrus homers (2) on a fly ball to left field.
Michael Young grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Hank Blalock called out on strikes.
Marlon Byrd grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Nelson Cruz singles on a line drive to left fielder Matt Holliday.
With David Murphy batting, Nelson Cruz steals (4) 2nd base.
David Murphy grounds out, pitcher Dan Giese to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Chris Davis strikes out swinging.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia strikes out swinging.
Ian Kinsler singles on a line drive to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Elvis Andrus singles on a ground ball to center fielder Ryan Sweeney. Ian Kinsler to 2nd.
Michael Young flies out to right fielder Travis Buck.
Hank Blalock flies out to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Marlon Byrd singles on a ground ball to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Nelson Cruz doubles (5) on a line drive to center fielder Ryan Sweeney. Marlon Byrd to 3rd.
David Murphy out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Ryan Sweeney. Marlon Byrd scores. Nelson Cruz to 3rd.
Chris Davis singles on a line drive to right fielder Travis Buck. Nelson Cruz scores.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia lines into an unassisted double play, first baseman Jason Giambi. Chris Davis doubled off 1st.
Ian Kinsler singles on a line drive to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Elvis Andrus grounds into a force out, third baseman Jack Hannahan to second baseman Bobby Crosby. Ian Kinsler out at 2nd. Elvis Andrus to 1st.
Michael Young grounds into a double play, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to second baseman Bobby Crosby to first baseman Jason Giambi. Elvis Andrus out at 2nd.
Hank Blalock grounds out, third baseman Jack Hannahan to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Marlon Byrd grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Pitching Change: Michael Wuertz replaces Dan Giese.
Nelson Cruz pops out to shortstop Orlando Cabrera.
David Murphy flies out to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Chris Davis flies out to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia lines out to right fielder Travis Buck.
Pitching Change: Russ Springer replaces Michael Wuertz.
Ian Kinsler lines out to right fielder Travis Buck.
Elvis Andrus flies out to right fielder Travis Buck.
Michael Young singles on a line drive to right fielder Travis Buck.
Hank Blalock flies out to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Defensive switch from second base to third base for Bobby Crosby.
Gregorio Petit remains in the game as the second baseman.
Pitching Change: Andrew Bailey replaces Russ Springer.
Marlon Byrd flies out to right fielder Travis Buck.
Nelson Cruz strikes out on a foul tip.
David Murphy strikes out on a foul tip.
Ryan Sweeney grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Chris Davis.
Orlando Cabrera grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Chris Davis.
Jason Giambi pops out to third baseman Michael Young.
Matt Holliday flies out to left fielder David Murphy.
Jack Cust singles on a soft fly ball to left fielder David Murphy.
Kurt Suzuki strikes out on a foul tip.
Travis Buck singles on a ground ball. Jack Cust out at 2nd, hit by batted ball, second baseman Ian Kinsler unassisted.
Bobby Crosby called out on strikes.
Jack Hannahan grounds out, pitcher Scott Feldman to first baseman Chris Davis.
Ryan Sweeney grounds out to first baseman Chris Davis.
Orlando Cabrera flies out to center fielder Marlon Byrd.
Jason Giambi walks.
Matt Holliday singles on a ground ball to left fielder David Murphy. Jason Giambi to 2nd.
Jack Cust grounds out to first baseman Chris Davis. Jason Giambi to 3rd. Matt Holliday to 2nd.
Kurt Suzuki doubles (9) on a fly ball to center fielder Marlon Byrd. Jason Giambi scores. Matt Holliday scores.
Travis Buck grounds out, second baseman Ian Kinsler to first baseman Chris Davis.
Bobby Crosby strikes out swinging.
Jack Hannahan flies out to center fielder Marlon Byrd.
Ryan Sweeney grounds out, second baseman Ian Kinsler to first baseman Chris Davis.
Orlando Cabrera flies out to center fielder Marlon Byrd.
Jason Giambi walks.
Matt Holliday grounds into a double play, third baseman Michael Young to second baseman Ian Kinsler to first baseman Chris Davis. Jason Giambi out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Derek Holland replaces Scott Feldman.
Jack Cust singles on a ground ball to third baseman Michael Young.
Kurt Suzuki grounds into a double play, pitcher Derek Holland to shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Chris Davis. Jack Cust out at 2nd.
Travis Buck flies out to center fielder Marlon Byrd.
Bobby Crosby grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Chris Davis.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Gregorio Petit replaces Jack Hannahan.
Gregorio Petit flies out to center fielder Marlon Byrd.
Ryan Sweeney grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Chris Davis.
Pitching Change: Frank Francisco replaces Derek Holland.
Orlando Cabrera walks.
Jason Giambi strikes out on a foul tip.
Matt Holliday strikes out swinging.
Jack Cust singles on a line drive to right fielder Nelson Cruz. Orlando Cabrera to 3rd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Rajai Davis replaces Jack Cust.
Kurt Suzuki flies out to left fielder David Murphy.
